short_description: pest guard is a pest services & agricultural chemicals company based in dar es salaam, tanzania.
long_description: pest guard limited is driven by committing and offering pest control services to its esteemed customers with optimum quality at economically competitive prices, by leveraging on all available resources, controlling wastages, improved efficiencies and target oriented business approach. our services are guaranteed whereby in undue event of re-infestation, we will provide remedial treatment at free of charge. our vision to be the best supplier of pest control and hygiene services and related products in tanzania and other markets in which we operate. our mission to supply quality products and services to our esteemed customers at economically affordable prices paying due attention to health and safety of people, animals and environment, conducting ourselves ethically. pest guard deals in wide variety of products that complements its pest control and hygiene services and agriculture sector. pest guard offers pest control and hygiene services for both residential and commercial properties. our company is licensed and registered with tropical pesticides research institute (tpri) of ministry of agriculture and food security as approved pest control operators.
generated_description: pest guard, legally known as pest guard limited, is a company specializing in pest control and hygiene services. based in dar es salaam, the company offers a range of services including general pest control, rodent control, termite and borer control, gas fumigation, and mosquito control. pest guard limited also supplies pesticides and agricultural equipment. the company is registered with the ministry of agriculture and food security and the ministry of health, and is approved by the tropical pesticides research institute (tpri). pest guard limited serves both residential and commercial properties across tanzania, including regions such as dar es salaam, arusha, kilimanjaro, mwanza, mtwara, morogoro, tanga, and zanzibar. the company is committed to providing high-quality services at competitive prices, with a focus on health, safety, and environmental responsibility.
generated_business_tags: fumigations with gas gas | hygiene solutions | mosquitoes control | pest control and hygiene services | rodent proof | gardening equipment and pesticides
